headline: Lauren Argenti Rawlings Joins Consello as Head of Consello Talent in the U.S.
summary: Consello, the leading global advisory and investing platform, today announced that Lauren Argenti Rawlings has joined the firm as Head of Consello Talent in the U.S. In the role, Lauren will oversee the launch of Consello's new executive search business, working with clients to attract and place transformative leadership talent while expanding the firm's Talent Advisory capabilities.

headline: Does Intuit (INTU) Have an Excellent Runway For Growth?
summary: Polen Capital, an investment management company, released its “Polen Focus Growth Strategy” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The equity market continued its strong performance in the third quarter of 2025, driven by enthusiasm for generative AI and strength in the semiconductor sector. In the quarter, the focus […]

headline: Intuit Mailchimp Supercharges Retailers' Marketing Efforts to Drive ROI
summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., October 14, 2025--Intuit Inc. (Nasdaq: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes Intuit TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp, today announced a suite of powerful new Intuit Mailchimp features designed to help retailers reach new customers and drive revenue growth during the busiest shopping season of the year.
